content: that is you may use the finished items for yourself or for gifts the pattern is not to be distributed for free or for money in any format without the permission of the designer items created from this pattern are not to be sold or used for commercial gain without the permission of the designer if you are interested in working out an agreement to distribute this pattern or to sell products made from this pattern please contact bonnie dean at bonnie@bonniedhandknitsandfiber com or ravelry id bonniedean bonnie dean bonnie dean became a tkga master knitter in april 2015 she lives in billings mt and the phoenix az area with her husband ed- ward bonnie rebranded her company as bonnied hand knits and fiber in september 2019 she has worked as a knitwear designer since 2014 and added technical editing and hand-dyed fiber to her brand in 2016 bonnie is enjoying applying her experience in fabric-based garment construction and design to a new medium her designs focus on modern embellishment texture and cables visit her website at https //www bonniedhandknitsandfiber com for pattern support educational newsletter sign-up and technical editing information subscribe to bonnie s youtube channel at https //www youtube com/channel/uckacxhknldtsbst7jxzlsga her instagram account @bonniedhandknitsandfiber and her ravelry group at http //www ravelry com/groups/bonnied-hand- knits-and-fiber-club bdhkf2016-6 all images text and illustration copyright bonnied hand knits and fiber llc april 2021
